name: Paper Party!
description:
What's the best way to build long lasting friendships? Throw a party of course! Explore a house filled with different types of paper people, solve puzzles, and make as many connections as possible! This project was created for the Lost Relics Game Jam 2022 with the theme of "connection."

CREDITS:
Programming: jace#2134, jteaaa#8556
Art: cil#9731, sheeply#4163, bruhmoment#4125
Music: sheeply#4163
